players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Bob: "Diana is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night - she is the mafioso. Diana must be trying to protect her partner."
You: "I'm sorry, but Bob's claim doesn't add up. Diana's investigation seems more reliable to me."
Bob: "Diana is the real mafioso trying to frame me. I investigated Alice - she's innocent. Vote Diana!"
Diana: "I am the detective. Bob is lying about his role. My investigation proves he is mafia. Vote Bob!"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
